en: My pen is old. I want a new one.
zh: 我的笔旧了。我想要一支新的。

en: My pen is very easy to write.
zh: 我的笔很好写。

en: You may use my pen at any time.
zh: 你随时都可以用我的笔。

en: Who is it that is sleeping on my bed?

en: My business is picking up again.

en: My beard grows quickly.
zh: 我的胡子长得很快。

en: The price of my piano lessons includes the use of the piano.

en: I've mine right here in my hand.

en: What did you do with my purse?

en: My punch sent him reeling into the rope.

en: My punch sent him reeling.
zh: 我一拳把他打得踉跄。

en: I can't find my bag.

en: What do you make of my pie?

en: You can have a ride on my motorcycle.
zh: 你可以搭我的摩托车。

en: Would you like to come to my party?

en: Will you please come to my party?

en: A girl opened the door in answer to my knock.
zh: 一个女孩开了门来回应我的敲门声。

en: Bring my notebook back to me, please.
zh: 请把我的笔记本还给我。

en: My notebook is in the desk.

en: My knife has such a fine edge.

en: Please drop by and see me.

en: My harsh words bruised her feeling.

en: My watch needs mending.

en: My clock needs to be fixed.

en: My watch doesn't keep good time.

en: My knowledge of German is poor.

en: My TV set is almost 15 years old, but it still has a good picture.
zh: 我的电视机快15年了，但画面仍然很好。

en: My tennis hasn't improved in the slightest.
zh: 我的网球水平一点也没有提高。

en: I like playing tennis, though I'm not very good at it.
zh: 我喜欢打网球，虽然我打得不太好。

en: This is all I can do.

en: All I can do is to work silently.
zh: 我所能做的就是默默地工作。

en: My tape recorder is compatible with your amplifier.

en: My duty is always before me.

en: Would you mind calling him for me?

en: Don't put off your departure on account of me.

en: Please don't take any trouble on my account.
zh: 请不要为我费心了。

en: Don't wait on my account.

en: I appreciate your graciousness and efforts on my behalf.

en: I can't find my duffel bag.
zh: 我找不到我的行李袋了。

en: You might ask before you use my typewriter.
zh: 你用我的打字机之前应该问一下。

en: Something is wrong with my typewriter.
zh: 我的打字机出问题了。

en: Keep your hands off my typewriter.
zh: 别碰我的打字机。

en: Sit beside me.

en: Will you help me with this?

en: My socks aren't here.

en: All of my strength gave out.

en: My stereo set is inferior to yours in sound quality.

en: My skirt is too long.

en: I can't find my suitcase.

en: Please keep an eye on my suitcase.

en: My shirt isn't dry yet.
zh: 我的衬衫还没干。

en: What shirt size should I have?

en: My jacket is not the same as yours.
zh: 我的夹克和你的不一样。

en: My jacket isn't the same as yours.
zh: 我的夹克和你的不一样。

en: My jeans shrank in the wash.

en: As compared with his, my collection is nothing.

en: The cloth absorbed the ink I had spilled.

en: Do you remember me?

en: Please don't laugh at me.

en: Please don't misunderstand me.
zh: 请不要误会我。

en: Whatever you say about me, say it to my face, not behind my back.
zh: 关于我的任何事，有什么话当面说，不要在背后说。

en: Some people think I'm weak-willed.

en: Don't trouble about me.
zh: 别为我操心。

en: Please note my words.
zh: 请记住我说的话。

en: Let me alone.
zh: 别烦我。

en: "Leave me alone," she said angrily.
zh: “别烦我，”她生气地说。

en: Don't bother yourself about me.
zh: 别为我费心。

en: He doesn't care a bit about me.
zh: 他一点也不在乎我。

en: I don't think I really matter to you.
zh: 我觉得我对于你来说并不重要。

en: Don't have any worries on my account.

en: There was a message for me, wasn't there?

en: I found my glass in pieces.

en: Don't put sugar in my coffee.

en: My overcoat is light but warm.

en: My coat has finally worn out.

en: There's a hole in my coat.

en: My coach said, "Failure teaches success."

en: All my class are hardworking.
zh: 我们班的所有人都很努力。

en: Everybody in my class prefers skiing to skating.
zh: 我们班的每个人都喜欢滑雪胜过滑冰。

en: There are 40 students in my class.

en: My camera doesn't need to be fixed.

en: My camera is the same as your camera.

en: My camera loads easily.

en: My camera is a Nikon.

en: My camera is different from yours.

en: Something's wrong with my camera.

en: My camera was stolen.

en: What have you done with my bag?

en: My basket is under the table.

en: I can't find my garment bag.

en: Charge this to my account.

en: My mother is beautiful.

en: My mother said if I eloped, she would never forgive me.

en: My father is very nice.

en: My big sister washes her hair every morning.

en: My favorite flavor is chocolate.

en: It has been ten years since my uncle went to Canada.

en: My grandfather hopes that I will enter college.

en: My nephew is allergic to eggs.

en: My nephew was excused because of his youth.
zh: 我侄子因为年纪小而被原谅了。

en: My family is small.

en: Will you read my essay and correct the mistakes, if any?

en: We call him Goro-san.

en: Apparently my anti-virus software is not up to snuff.
zh: 看来我的杀毒软件不够好。

en: There will be a reward for the person who finds my dog.

en: Who was it that read my diary while I was out?

en: My cousin is the last person to break his promise.
zh: 我表弟/堂弟/表兄/堂兄是最不可能违背承诺的人。

en: My cousin isn't the kind of person who'd ever break a promise.
zh: 我表弟/堂弟/表兄/堂兄不是那种会违背承诺的人。

en: My cousin is good at doing magic tricks.

en: My cousin was familiar with trouble when he was young.
zh: 我表弟/堂弟/表兄/堂兄年轻的时候就熟悉各种麻烦事。

en: My cousin is a little older than I.
zh: 我表弟/堂弟/表兄/堂兄比我大一点。

en: My cousin is a little older than I am.
zh: 我表弟/堂弟/表兄/堂兄比我大一点。

en: One of my cousins is married to a novelist.

en: I want you to meet my cousin.

en: The building was still there in my time.
zh: 在我那个年代，那栋建筑还在。

en: My house looks to the south.

en: Keep my words in mind.
zh: 记住我的话。

en: I'll show my album to you.
zh: 我会给你看我的相册。

en: My American classes are more informal.
zh: 我的美国课程更随意。

en: My apartment is located within five minutes' walk of the station.
zh: 我的公寓离车站步行五分钟。

en: My apartment gets plenty of sunshine.
zh: 我的公寓阳光充足。

en: My anorak, such as it was, stood me in good stead.
zh: 我的滑雪衫，虽然不怎么样，但帮了我大忙。

en: Please take my advice.
zh: 请听我的劝告。

en: My e-mail address has been changed as follows.
zh: 我的电子邮件地址已更改如下。

en: My e-mail address will be changed effective Aug. 1 as follows.
zh: 我的电子邮件地址将于8月1日起更改如下。

en: My e-mail address will be as follows effective April 1.
zh: 我的电子邮件地址将于4月1日起更改如下。

en: My e-mail address has been changed.
zh: 我的电子邮件地址已经更改。

en: I'm afraid you must have misinterpreted my e-mail of Jun 8.
zh: 恐怕你一定误解了我6月8日的电子邮件。

en: My sixty-year-old aunt inherited the huge estate.
zh: 我六十岁的姑姑/姨妈继承了这笔巨大的遗产。

en: This has been the most awful day in my eleven-year-old life.
zh: 这是我十一年的人生中最糟糕的一天。

en: Will you tell me?
zh: 你能告诉我吗？

en: The boy who spoke to me was a new student.
zh: 和我说话的那个男孩是个新生。

en: You can get hold of me at the Yasesu Hotel.
zh: 你可以在八重洲酒店找到我。

en: A good idea struck me.
zh: 我突然有了一个好主意。

en: I have no family to provide for.
zh: 我没有需要赡养的家人。

en: Ring the bell when you want me.
zh: 你需要我的时候就按铃。

en: Speak in my behalf.
zh: 替我说话。

en: It is a lot of fun to read his letter sent to me every month.
zh: 每个月读他写给我的信都很有趣。

en: I wish I could use magic.
zh: 我希望我会魔法。

en: You may as well tell me the truth.
zh: 你还不如告诉我真相。

en: Please let me know the truth.
zh: 请告诉我真相。

en: I'll stay here if you really want me to.
zh: 如果你真的想让我留下，我就留在这里。

en: She was a bit hasty in answering me.
zh: 她回答我的时候有点仓促。

en: My father has a lot of books.
zh: 我父亲有很多书。

en: The girl who gave me beautiful flowers was your sister.
zh: 那个送我漂亮花的女孩是你妹妹。

en: Give me a blank sheet of paper.
zh: 给我一张白纸。

en: Let me handle it.
zh: 让我来处理。

en: Leave it up to me.
zh: 交给我吧。

en: Don't yell at me.
zh: 别对我大喊大叫。

en: I'll leave my number in case you want to call me.
zh: 我会留下我的号码，如果你想打电话给我的话。

en: Have there been any phone calls for me?
zh: 有我的电话吗？

en: Let me know by telephone.
zh: 请用电话通知我。

en: Please give me a call.
zh: 请给我打个电话。

en: He threw mud at me and made me dirty.
zh: 他朝我扔泥巴，弄脏了我。

en: Will you make me a paper crane?
zh: 你能给我叠一只纸鹤吗？

en: You can't expect me to make no misspellings at all.
zh: 你不能指望我完全不拼写错误。

en: Will you draw me a map to show me the way to the station?
zh: 你能给我画一张地图，告诉我怎么去车站吗？

en: As far as I know, he is American.
zh: 据我所知，他是美国人。

en: Have you got 5,000 yen you could lend me?
zh: 你有五千日元可以借给我吗？

en: Do you have 5,000 yen you could lend me?
zh: 你有五千日元可以借给我吗？

en: I couldn't find a clerk to wait on me.
zh: 我找不到服务员来招待我。

en: His anger towards me has not softened.
zh: 他对我的愤怒还没有消减。

en: I don't like the way he speaks to me.
zh: 我不喜欢他跟我说话的方式。

en: Follow me and do exactly the way I do it.
zh: 跟着我，完全照我做的做。

en: You are barking up the wrong tree by asking me to betray my country.
zh: 你找我背叛我的国家是找错人了。

en: I'm going to have a baby.
zh: 我要生孩子了。

en: It is very kind of you to give me your seat.
zh: 您把座位让给我，真是太好了。

en: Give me some water, please.
zh: 请给我一些水。

en: Bring me a glass of water.
zh: 给我拿一杯水。

en: A new room was assigned to me.
zh: 我被分配到一个新的房间。

en: Could you spare me a little time?
zh: 您能抽出一点时间给我吗？

en: Give me a few.
zh: 给我几个。

en: It is wise of you to ask me for advice.
zh: 你向我寻求建议是明智的。

en: I'll help you within the limits of my ability.
zh: 我会在我的能力范围内帮助你。

en: I am pleased to help you if I can.
zh: 如果我能帮到你，我很高兴。

en: All I can do is to give her advice.
zh: 我所能做的就是给她建议。

en: Teach judo to me.
zh: 教我柔道。

en: Follow me.
zh: 跟着我。

en: Let me repair it.
zh: 让我来修理它。

en: My hobby is skiing.
zh: 我的爱好是滑雪。

en: I'm willing to help you if you want me to.
zh: 如果你需要我，我愿意帮助你。

en: Do you wish me to help?
zh: 你需要我帮忙吗？

en: Please write a letter to me.

en: The man who is waving to me is my uncle.
zh: 正在向我挥手的那个人是我的叔叔。

en: Let me fix the car.
zh: 让我来修车。

en: Yesterday I had my bicycle stolen.
zh: 昨天我的自行车被偷了。

en: My bike was stolen yesterday.
zh: 我的自行车昨天被偷了。

en: She asked me to bring them.
zh: 她让我把它们带去。

en: Do you think it looks good on me?
zh: 你觉得我穿这个好看吗？

en: Let me know your exam results.
zh: 告诉我你的考试成绩。

en: Let me know what you got on your exam.
zh: 告诉我你考试考了多少分。

en: Give me a sheet of paper.
zh: 给我一张纸。

en: My sister got engaged.
zh: 我妹妹订婚了。

en: My older sister got engaged.
zh: 我姐姐订婚了。

en: My job will only last two years at most.
zh: 我的工作最多只能持续两年。

en: Let me help you with your work.
zh: 我来帮你做你的工作吧。

en: Please allow me to go.
zh: 请允许我去。

en: Please let me go.
zh: 请让我走。

en: I saw a man coming toward me.
zh: 我看到一个男人朝我走来。

en: Don't answer me back.
zh: 不要顶嘴。

en: He acted fairly towards me.
zh: 他对我公平公正。

en: I think they sold you a bad article if ask me.
zh: 依我看，他们卖给你的东西质量不好。

en: If you ask me, she's a little unusual.
zh: 依我看，她有点不寻常。

en: You might have told me.
zh: 你应该告诉我一声的。

en: It was her that told me.
zh: 是她告诉我的。

en: I wish I had wings to fly.
zh: 我希望我有翅膀可以飞。

en: It is no use asking me for money.
zh: 问我要钱也没用。

en: This aroused my fears.
zh: 这引起了我的恐惧。

en: Please explain the rule to me.
zh: 请给我解释一下这个规则。

en: He did it unbeknownst to me.
zh: 他瞒着我做了这件事。

en: As far as I'm concerned, I have no complaint.
zh: 就我而言，我没有任何抱怨。
